DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate bioequivalence Mylan 's liothyronine sodium 50 mcg tablet King 's Cytomel® 50 mcg tablet follow single , oral 100 mcg ( 2 x 50 mcg ) dose administration fasting condition .
DOC.brief_title: Fasting Study Liothyronine Sodium Tablets ( 50 Mcg ) Cytomel® Tablets ( 50 Mcg )
DOC.criteria: healthy male and/or nonpregnant , nonlactating female , 18 year older able swallow medication institutionalized subject history significant disease use prescription OTC medication within 14 day prior start study receive investigational product within 30 day prior start study
